text: Robert Dean Hales (August 24, 1932 - October 1, 2017) was a member of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church). As a member of the Quorum of the Twelve, Hales was accepted by the church as a prophet, seer, and revelator. He was the seventh most senior apostle among the ranks of the church. He was born in New York City. Hales died on October 1, 2017 at a hospital in Salt Lake City, Utah at the age of 85. ==Notes== ==References== * * *"Elder Robert Dean Hales: Assistant to the Council of the Twelve", Ensign, May 1975 ==Other websites== *"General Authorities: Elder Robert D.
